string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v2.4.3: Check userinput for default prefix
v2.4.2: Remove ads for donator, fix O2 captcha
v2.4.1: Remove ads for donator, minor changes to Sipgate and GUI
v2.3: Add Changelog, auto follow GMX hostchange, fix for 1.6
v2.2.7: Better hint on sender preference, add service-down message
v2.2.6: Fix save messages after send
v2.2.5: Check sender preferences on enter
v2.2.4: Add message for GMX result code 71, update admob lib
v2.2.3: Improve free counter, remove ads for donator
v2.2.2: Add message for GMX result code 8
v2.1: Turn off GMX connector by default, remove ads for donators
